title: thepeterson
author: thepeterson
content: There's a penalty of time that can be spent to test this model here.Don't ask for portfolio - pay what you wish only after the work is delivered and you are satisfied!Logo designSocial media post designFull brandingPrintable designsTemplateI want a.....My imaginations are...My logo link...Colors...Specific size if needed.For sure, I have the right to accept or ignore the request.. it will only be based on if it comes from a reputable member that won't waste my time or notThanks!defi related work & signatures or avatars won't be done

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on June 30, 2023, 08:41:18 PMThere's a penalty of time that can be spent to test this model here.Don't ask for portfolio - pay what you wish only after the work is delivered and you are satisfiedWhen it comes to designing and writing you should have a sample of work, people will know that you are already an expert and capable of delivering if you can post a sample of your work, so you can save the time of your potential client and your time as well.QuoteFor sure, I have the right to accept or ignore the request.. it will only be based on if it comes from a reputable member that won't waste my time or notEstablish and reputable designers started their venture by offering free design and then later a cut rate to create a portfolio in this forum they don't have to be reputable members because the majority of your clients will come from new members who would like to launch a marketing campaign here.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 01, 2023, 05:47:26 AMQuote from: thepeterson on June 30, 2023, 08:41:18 PMThere's a penalty of time that can be spent to test this model here.Don't ask for portfolio - pay what you wish only after the work is delivered and you are satisfiedWhen it comes to designing and writing you should have a sample of work, people will know that you are already an expert and capable of delivering if you can post a sample of your work, so you can save the time of your potential client and your time as well.QuoteFor sure, I have the right to accept or ignore the request.. it will only be based on if it comes from a reputable member that won't waste my time or notEstablish and reputable designers started their venture by offering free design and then later a cut rate to create a portfolio in this forum they don't have to be reputable members because the majority of your clients will come from new members who would like to launch a marketing campaign here.For the sake of privacy on this forum it looks better to have it done that way. Here is a decade of designing skills. I don't intend to have this as a long term service here. Will only do a couple of work to collect some cash. The work doesn't have to be related to crypto at all the reputable member may have or need to launch a side buss.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 01, 2023, 05:56:18 AMFor the sake of privacy on this forum it looks better to have it done that way. Here is a decade of designing skills. I don't intend to have this as a long term service here. Will only do a couple of work to collect some cash. The work doesn't have to be related to crypto at all the reputable member may have or need to launch a side buss.You can't really tell, you should have anticipated that your service will have demand here if your design is good, but have it your way since you already told us that you will do a couple of work, and collect cash and you don't have this long-term service here.What you're offering is still good onlyQuote pay what you wish only after the work is delivered and you are satisfied!But you did not post the price of your service, for your potential client to see if it's competitive as we all know there are others who offer similar services.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: As the title says pay what you wish. Even if after the task is done and you're so happy with it and only sent $1 I won't complain. However, I do believe that people here won't do such thing.. and if they do it I'll still accept it as I published the service based on this model. I don't price or complain.
